channel.title: Josh Stark (0xstark.eth) / @0xstark
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @0xstark. Generated by nitter.freedit.eu

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: lots of updates these days... i have one more: i am stepping down from Devcon Team Lead role and the incredible @NathanSexer is stepping up to take the interim Team Lead role for Devconnect 2025!!
it is bittersweet, as i love this team and @EFDevcon and @EFDevconnect, but it was never my goal to work longterm on events, and i think in this moment the team is in a great position for this change. a big hearty thank you to all who have been part of this journey â€” your involvement in this community is what makes devcon devconnect and ethereum extraordinary ðŸ«¶
and stay tuned for some more updates from the Devconnect team on Wednesday!! ðŸŒŽ ðŸ‘€
item.dc:creator: @skylar_eth
item.description:
lots of updates these days... i have one more: i am stepping down from Devcon Team Lead role and the incredible @NathanSexer is stepping up to take the interim Team Lead role for Devconnect 2025!!

it is bittersweet, as i love this team and @EFDevcon and @EFDevconnect, but it was never my goal to work longterm on events, and i think in this moment the team is in a great position for this change. a big hearty thank you to all who have been part of this journey â€” your involvement in this community is what makes devcon devconnect and ethereum extraordinary ðŸ«¶

and stay tuned for some more updates from the Devconnect team on Wednesday!! ðŸŒŽ ðŸ‘€

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 38. @SuperRare is an NFT marketplace for curated digital art on ethereum.
Since launching in 2018, SuperRare has done over $250M in sales, paid out >$3M in royalties to artists, and home to many top crypto artists who have sold pieces for millions.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
38. @SuperRare is an NFT marketplace for curated digital art on ethereum.

Since launching in 2018, SuperRare has done over $250M in sales, paid out >$3M in royalties to artists, and home to many top crypto artists who have sold pieces for millions.

item.title: RT by @0xstark: 1/ Introducing ZKnox @zknoxhq ! This new research organization is at the forefront of advanced cryptography, backed by a grant from the Ethereum Foundation. Their mission: provide high impact open source code that improves Ethereum security and efficiency.

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: the comment section got pretty heated, so hereâ€™s my take:
there arenâ€™t a lot of gen z people in this space because theyâ€™re mostly working on different things or just following the career paths their colleges push them toward.
a lot of them hate their jobs. a big reason is that they donâ€™t believe their work actually matters.
most of the young talent in crypto comes from people who have gone deep down the rabbit hole to discover it for themselves. itâ€™s not easy enough to stumble into, and thatâ€™s a problem. crypto benefits when more people see it as an industry that offers flexibility and a way to contribute on a global scale.
instead of spending millions on exclusive conferences and insider events, maybe we should invest more in making it clear that crypto is one of the only industries where talent can break in from anywhere, work from anywhere, and operate at a level that isnâ€™t constrained by geography or traditional career pipelines.
item.dc:creator: @binji_x
item.description:
the comment section got pretty heated, so hereâ€™s my take:

there arenâ€™t a lot of gen z people in this space because theyâ€™re mostly working on different things or just following the career paths their colleges push them toward.

a lot of them hate their jobs. a big reason is that they donâ€™t believe their work actually matters.

most of the young talent in crypto comes from people who have gone deep down the rabbit hole to discover it for themselves. itâ€™s not easy enough to stumble into, and thatâ€™s a problem. crypto benefits when more people see it as an industry that offers flexibility and a way to contribute on a global scale.

instead of spending millions on exclusive conferences and insider events, maybe we should invest more in making it clear that crypto is one of the only industries where talent can break in from anywhere, work from anywhere, and operate at a level that isnâ€™t constrained by geography or traditional career pipelines.

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: We have been discussing it a lot. At the moment we assume a model as follows: * we start with full trust and parallel full mandate * operating independently yet communicating async often and supporting each other * supporting more regions * taking advantage of our distinct strengths
You should be able to choose whichever Co-ED you want to communicate with based on your style and needs and any of us will have the mandate to execute on the top level. Treat it as 2 for 1 rather having to wait for both of us to communicate.
Still, the EF leadership team has slightly more collective feel than what you would expect from a CEO-led organization. Vision comes from @VitalikButerin and @AyaMiyagotchi , strategy comes from the leadership team / entire EF team, execution from myself and @hwwonx will be to serve EF and the ecosystem / communicate as much as possible and provide the best decisions when needed without delay.
item.dc:creator: @tkstanczak
item.description:
We have been discussing it a lot. At the moment we assume a model as follows:
* we start with full trust and parallel full mandate
* operating independently yet communicating async often and supporting each other
* supporting more regions
* taking advantage of our distinct strengths

You should be able to choose whichever Co-ED you want to communicate with based on your style and needs and any of us will have the mandate to execute on the top level. Treat it as 2 for 1 rather having to wait for both of us to communicate.

Still, the EF leadership team has slightly more collective feel than what you would expect from a CEO-led organization. Vision comes from @VitalikButerin and @AyaMiyagotchi , strategy comes from the leadership team / entire EF team, execution from myself and @hwwonx will be to serve EF and the ecosystem / communicate as much as possible and provide the best decisions when needed without delay.

nitter.freedit.eu/TrustlessState/status/1895857820077113839#m

item.title: RT by @0xstark: Very excited to finally announce this! @tkstanczak and @hwwonx will bring fresh execution, and together, we will work to advance the values of Ethereum!
item.dc:creator: @AyaMiyagotchi
item.description:
Very excited to finally announce this! @tkstanczak and @hwwonx will bring fresh execution, and together, we will work to advance the values of Ethereum!

nitter.freedit.eu/ethereumfndn/status/1895851576251826227#m

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: Iâ€™m honored and thrilled to serve as co-Executive Director of the @ethereumfndn alongside @tkstanczak .
Everyone has their perspective on the Ethereum Foundation. Just as Ethereum continues to evolve, so does the EFâ€”but the core values we have upheld for years remain unchanged. A better world is possible when we stand by these values and the people who share them.

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: I was asked and accepted to be a co-Executive Director (alongside Hsiao Wei) of Ethereum Foundation. Officially starting around 17th of March (pending paperwork).
Please reach out via Telegram to @tkstanczak if you think we should talk / prefer async but a call also works https://calendly.com/tkstanczak/community-discussions
Looking forward to making Ethereum stronger than ever and supporting you all to succeed.
item.dc:creator: @tkstanczak
item.description:
I was asked and accepted to be a co-Executive Director (alongside Hsiao Wei) of Ethereum Foundation. Officially starting around 17th of March (pending paperwork).

Please reach out via Telegram to @tkstanczak if you think we should talk / prefer async but a call also works calendly.com/tkstanczak/commâ€¦

Looking forward to making Ethereum stronger than ever and supporting you all to succeed.

nitter.freedit.eu/ethereumfndn/status/1895851576251826227#m

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: 1/ The Ethereum Foundation is thrilled to welcome Hsiao-Wei Wang and Tomasz Stanczak as co-Executive Directors. This new leadership structure marks an exciting new chapter in the Foundation's evolution as we continue to support a growing Ethereum ecosystem.

item.title: RT by @0xstark: We, the Ethereum Cypherpunks, act on principles. We fucking care about privacy. We fucking care about security. We fucking care about censorship resistance. And we will always fucking defend these core principles. I wrote the Ethereum Cypherpunk Manifesto because this shit matters. If you're butthurt, go touch some grass and get a reality check. We, the Ethereum Cypherpunks, stand united in our pursuit of a more private, secure, and censorship-resistant future. Like it or not. https://hackmd.io/@pcaversaccio/the-ethereum-cypherpunk-manifesto
item.dc:creator: @pcaversaccio
item.description:
We, the Ethereum Cypherpunks, act on principles. We fucking care about privacy. We fucking care about security. We fucking care about censorship resistance. And we will always fucking defend these core principles. I wrote the Ethereum Cypherpunk Manifesto because this shit matters. If you're butthurt, go touch some grass and get a reality check. We, the Ethereum Cypherpunks, stand united in our pursuit of a more private, secure, and censorship-resistant future. Like it or not.
hackmd.io/@pcaversaccio/the-â€¦

nitter.freedit.eu/VitalikButerin/status/1895801873896259819#m

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 37. BCAP is a tokenized fund: an onchain asset that represents an economic interest in offchain venture capital investments, launched by @blockchaincap in 2017.
In December, BCAP migrated to @zksync, an Ethereum L2.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
37. BCAP is a tokenized fund: an onchain asset that represents an economic interest in offchain venture capital investments, launched by @blockchaincap in 2017.

In December, BCAP migrated to @zksync, an Ethereum L2.
